org.js4ms.server

Interface Service

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractService, RtspService

    public interface Service
    Interface exposed by objects that service messages received on a Connection.
    Author:
    Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void service(Connection connection)
      Reads and processes a single message or stream of messages.
      void start()
      Starts the service.
      void stop()
      Stops the service.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the service. Used to initialize the service, start threads or timers and acquire resources.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the service. Used to terminate threads and timers and releases resources.

      • service

        void service(Connection connection)
             throws EOFException,
                    SocketException,
                    IOException,
                    InterruptedException
        Reads and processes a single message or stream of messages.
        Parameters:
        connection -
        Throws:
